Title: Seventh Son
Writer: Charles Leavitt (screenplay by), Steven Knight (screenplay by), Matt Greenberg (screen story by), Joseph Delaney (based on the book titled "The Spook's Apprentice" by)
Actors: Jeff Bridges, Ben Barnes, Julianne Moore, Alicia Vikander
Plot: When Mother Malkin, the queen of evil witches, escapes the pit she was imprisoned in by professional monster hunter Spook decades ago and kills his apprentice, he recruits young Tom, the seventh son of the seventh son, to help him.
Production: Legendary Pictures, Thunder Road Film, Wigram Productions
